EmailTemplate.description: This is send to Staffing Associate record owner when candidate returns unsigned contract
EmailTemplate.name: SF to Staffing Associate Candidate withdrawal
EmailTemplate.subject: An applicant has returned their contract unsigned
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.OwnerFirstName},
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} has withdrawn from the application process. Please review their record and change their Job Placement status to "Withdrawn".
Please click on this link to review the record: {!Job_Application__c.Link}
Thanks,
Central Operations
This is a standard email, sent automatically when a applicant selects "I no longer wish to work for The Challenge".
